name: pdfsearch
title: PDFSearch
description: Search across collections of PDF documents.
author: kevin-pek

commands.name: open
commands.title: View Outline
commands.description: View outline for a single PDF file.

scripts.build-swift: swift build --configuration=release --arch arm64 --arch x86_64 && cp .build/apple/Products/Release/GetOutline assets && cp .build/apple/Products/Release/SearchDocument assets && cp .build/apple/Products/Release/DrawImage assets
